description: This file contains unit tests for the Angular template implementation and project initialization workflows in a Python project using pytest. It tests template info extraction, project directory structure creation, script execution, configuration loading, and template variable replacement.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Creates and cleans up a temporary directory for tests.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Sets up a mock Angular template directory with configuration and sample files.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Creates a sample project configuration object for testing.

methods.name: test_angular_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that the template correctly provides initialization info including environment commands.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests the complete project initialization process, including directory and file creation with correct content.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks that post-processing scripts run and produce expected side effects.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures configuration can be loaded correctly from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Validates that template variable placeholders are properly replaced in generated files.
